text: Pre-heat your oven to 350 °F (177 °C).  Mix the chocolate, salt, and condensed milk in a double boiler over boiling water. Stir and cook for about 5 to 7 minutes, making sure that nothing burns and that everything thickens. Remove the boiler from the heat and combine the coconut and vanilla into the chocolate mixture.  Create little drops of the mixture onto the baking sheet and set each drop about 1 inch (2.5 cm) apart from each other for expansion.  Place an almond on each drop.  Place the baking sheet in the oven for 10 to 12 minutes. Watch the batch carefully since the bottoms of the candy can turn more brown than the top. Place the finished products on the cooling rack for time to cool down.  Finished.
